data.title: Sreelekha Mitra falls prey to a scam, loses money
data.meta_description: Actress Sreelekha Mitra celebrated her birthday amidst unfortunate circumstances. Stricken with a fever, she unwittingly became a victim of cyber scam, losing a substantial sum of Rs one lakh just a day before her birthday. The incident happened when an unidentified caller instructed her to download a mobile app. In her weakened state due to illness, she complied, only to realize that she had lost a significant amount from her bank account. The actress candidly shared her experience on social media, warning others about such scams. Sreelekha reported the incident to the police and the cyber cell, hoping for a resolution. While refraining from disclosing the sum lost, she stressed the importance of awareness to prevent others from falling victim to similar schemes.
data.text: Actress Sreelekha Mitra celebrated her birthday amidst unfortunate circumstances. Stricken with a fever, she unwittingly became a victim of cyber scam, losing a substantial sum of Rs one lakh just a day before her birthday. The incident happened when an unidentified caller instructed her to download a mobile app. In her weakened state due to illness, she complied, only to realize that she had lost a significant amount from her bank account. The actress candidly shared her experience on social media, warning others about such scams. Sreelekha reported the incident to the police and the cyber cell, hoping for a resolution. While refraining from disclosing the sum lost, she stressed the importance of awareness to prevent others from falling victim to similar schemes.
